name: Chaos Indeed
description:
Well...
That was an interesting experience for my first game jam. Our team "technically consisted on two people, me, and this other dude named Ozan. I being the programmer of the team did all the programming (what a suprise), and Ozan made all the art. Obviously were not the best, and its a pretty crappy game not gonna lie, but i learned a lot from this expreience and honestly just play the game because the music is lit.
Enjoy !

P.S. I Most of this work was done in the last 10 hrs of the jam because i was incapable of getting work done with friends around.
